fields.name: ALEX_SKIN_LOCATION
javadoc: The default skin for the Alex model.

fields.name: STEVE_SKIN_LOCATION
javadoc: The default skin for the Steve model.

methods.name: getDefaultSkin
javadoc: Returns the default skind for versions prior to 1.8, which is always the Steve texture.

methods.name: getDefaultSkin
javadoc: Retrieves the default skin for this player. Depending on the model used this will be Alex or Steve.

methods.name: getSkinModelName
javadoc: Retrieves the type of skin that a player is using. The Alex model is slim while the Steve model is default.

methods.name: isAlexDefault
javadoc: Checks if a players skin model is slim or the default. The Alex model is slime while the Steve model is default.
